siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Being productive is hard. Success is based on prioritized task lists and the Pomodoro Technique. Plan your week, set your daily tasks, and reflect on the past days to reach all your goals.
blogPost.body: Being productive is hard. Success is based on prioritized task lists and the Pomodoro Technique. Plan your week, set your daily tasks, and reflect on the past days to reach all your goals.
blogPost.title: Success Planner - Minimalist iOS/Android app to track daily tasks
blogPost.author: Arnaud

localize.description: 保持高效率是很难的。成功是基于按优先顺序排列的任务列表和波莫多罗(Pomodoro)技术。计划你的一周，设定你的每日任务，反思过去几天以达到你所有的目标。
localize.tagline: 极简主义的iOS/Android应用程序可跟踪日常任务

localize.description: 保持高效率是很難的。成功是基於按優先順序排列的任務列表和波莫多羅(Pomodoro)技術。計劃你的一週，設定你的每日任務，反思過去幾天以達到你所有的目標。
localize.tagline: 極簡主義的iOS/Android應用程序可跟蹤日常任務

previous.excerpt: Blending Psychology and Artificial Intelligence with layers of insights from 10,000+ books and articles, Odo is your empathetic AI companion that chats, reads, thinks, and offers a helpful conversation to help you grow. Only available in India.
previous.title: Odo - An empathetic AI companion to help you grow

localize.description: 将心理学和人工智能与来自10,000多本书和文章的多层洞察力融为一体，Odo是您富有同理心的AI同伴，它聊天、阅读、思考，并提供有用的对话来帮助您成长。只在印度有售。
localize.tagline: 一个富有同情心的人工智能伴侣，帮助你成长

localize.description: 將心理學和人工智能與來自10,000多本書和文章的多層洞察力融爲一體，Odo是您富有同理心的AI同伴，它聊天、閱讀、思考，並提供有用的對話來幫助您成長。只在印度有售。
localize.tagline: 一個富有同情心的人工智能伴侶，幫助你成長

next.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
next.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS

localize.description: Invoice是一个基于文档的发票制作应用程序，仅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平台上可用。您的所有发票文件和首选项都存储在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同设备无缝工作，而无需创建用于同步的帐户。
localize.tagline: 适用于iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基于文档的发票生成器应用程序

localize.description: Invoice是一個基於文檔的發票製作應用程序，僅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平臺上可用。您的所有發票文件和首選項都存儲在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同設備無縫工作，而無需創建用於同步的帳戶。
localize.tagline: 適用於iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基於文檔的發票生成器應用程序
